  • 2.9. h5pywrappers.scalar

2.9. h5pywrappers.scalar¶

For loading and saving HDF5 “scalars”.

Functions

load

Load an HDF5 "scalar" from an HDF5 file.

save

Save an HDF5 "scalar" to an HDF5 file as a zero-dimensional HDF5 dataset.
